shortDescription: Checks if a gamepad button has been pressed just right now.
longDescription: When the button is held for a little bit longer, this function will return true, check `isrepeat` return value.

arguments.name: buttonID
arguments.description: The ID of the button [1-7]: 1: left, 2: right, 3: up, 4: down, 5: A, 6: B and 7: Start.

returns.name: state
returns.description: True if the button has been pressed just right now, false otherwise.

returns.name: isrepeat
returns.description: True if this function is returning true after holding the button for 2 seconds.
